resources.string: Tailored Android delights, ready for your exploration
Schedule alarmed event. An event can be making network call, or showing a notification. On the next step you will be able to choose a date and time. And can schedule static text notification.

Start a foreground service. A foreground service are those which are noticeable to the user. Like music play, or recording audio/video. Here user will be able to track work out. Tracking includes calories burnt, distance walked and realtime map tracking.
Area name can not be empty
